column5: Yes there is, beer and hooters girls to go with the wings! Congrats on the win.
Great report and a cool idea.

Ok, so it wasn't a real tournament but we have these on a regualr basis and today I won.  Each person has 30 minutes to choose a spot to fish and the other 2 people in the boat obviously have to follow (we are all in the same boat). Every 30 minutes there is a new person in charge of location so it is always changing. Prize is 20 wings to winner with the losers paying. We weigh our 3 biggest bass. Today, I won.  Jaydub and Jimmy are buying the wings on Monday night.  Woohoo! Here are a few pics of some of the hogs we got into. My biggest fish.  Jaydubs biggest fish of the day  Jimmy's biggest fish of the day. (And it looks like a tornado might be in the region as well)
cool concept. Looks like you were all winners today.
looks like you all did good.  That's a great idea you guys have to try and fish different spots.
Cool, sounds like fun.  Enjoy the wings and Nice Fish!!  Joey
Cant get much better than that eh! Lots of Smallies(well biggies) and chicken wings.lol. Nice pics.
Now tell the truth, this is a well conceived tournament just so you can get into Hooters and get some wings...right.  Nice fish.
Right on Chris Nice hawgs Congrats on the win    Enjoy the wings Leechman
Hey, I resemble that remark. I didn't even know they had wings at Hooters Family Restaurant
Congrats on the win and enjoy the wings!
nice bass congrats
Nice fish Cudz! Enjoy your free food!
Hog-alicious, nice hittin! Whats witht the swirls on the third pic? I started trippin
i love those big sloppy simcoe smallies. even better than the wings is the bragging rights and smack talk as you enjoy your meal.
Congrates on yesterday's win Cudz ...we won't tell'em bout Monday's tourney  Nice art work on Jimmy's pic
What happened Monday?  Where are the pics and the report?  As far as I am concerned there is no proof that there was even a tournament on Monday.
Congratz on the win dude!  Any endorsement offers on the table yet?  Nice smallies - thanks for the report...  Cheers, Ryan
Some very impressive fish for everyone involved there Cudz & congrats on the win.   It's always fun when you can make things a bit more interesting with a little competition against buds.

Well done man, those are all some big smallies, and that sounds like an interesting idea for a little tournament, I might have to try something like that in the future.  Oh and you guys are quite brave to go out in a tornadoe, especially on Simcoe!  I am nervous to take my 14' tinnie and 9.9 out there, I imagine that tornadoes like that can come up at any time, and the closer you are to shore the more they swirl!  Daryl
Nice fishin......enjoy your wings!
Nice fish!! Congrats... no better prize than wings!!
Nice look'n Smallies Congrats & what happened Monday maybe some of us would believe their story with out pictures lol Richard
You're right, no proof of that one on OFC. If there was ever a tournament I should have posted a report for that was the one...lesson learned
My team on Monday got outsmarted by another team
Great win Cudzy,  'hooters Family Restaurant'....
